protein.general_function: Involved in cAMP-dependent protein kinase inhibitor activity
protein.specific_function: Extremely potent competitive inhibitor of cAMP-dependent protein kinase activity, this protein interacts with the catalytic subunit of the enzyme after the cAMP-induced dissociation of its regulatory chains

go_class.description: negative regulation of protein kinase activity

reference.reference_text: Collins SP, Uhler MD: Characterization of PKIgamma, a novel isoform of the protein kinase inhibitor of cAMP-dependent protein kinase. J Biol Chem. 1997 Jul 18;272(29):18169-78.
